subject: Soccer
World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: With another World Cup approaching, the U.S. women’s soccer team is now captained by Kristine Lilly, who is a month shy of 36 in chronological years but seemingly ageless in soccer years.
snippet: With another World Cup approaching, the U.S. women’s soccer team is now captained by Kristine Lilly, who is a month shy of 36 in chronological years but seemingly ageless in soccer years.
